channel.title: Project Escape
channel.description:
Project Escape is needing new members :) We have a friendly staff, great eco system, tons of features, plenty to do, and updates daily/weekly.
Our forum has guides to help you get started, and you can ask any questions you may have. Below the screenshots is a simple guide.
Forum link: [url=http://projectescape.x10.mx/forum/]http://projectescape.x10.mx/forum/[/url]
Client link: (If you use any other client it maynot login properly). [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?lp9nj0mnc935wwe]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?lp9nj0mnc935wwe[/url]
Screenshots: [b][i]Runecarfting[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img690/3876/abbs.png[/img]
[b][i]Ard. Go here for stalls.[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img4/4691/ard.png[/img]
[b][i]Bandit Camp - One of many training areas :)[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img198/2071/bandit.png[/img]
[b][i]Fully working Barrows.[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img96/6618/barroq.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img209/2464/38191141.png[/img]
[b][i]Brim. Dungeon plenty of training here :) Works 100%[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img17/8710/brim.png[/img]
[b][i]Chaos tunnels, fully working[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img842/4628/chaosi.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img404/4650/chaosny.png[/img]
[b][i]Ard cloak tele - Teles to correct location. May be changed.[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img849/4729/cloak.png[/img]
[b][i]Lighthouse, go through the doors, down the ladders to train on daggs[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img15/7316/dagsd.png[/img]
[b][i]Fully working dice, forced text overhead into chat.[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img577/5451/diceg.png[/img]
[b][i]Dragon pick works 100%, correct speed and animation.[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img96/7581/dpickz.png[/img]
[b][i]Edgeville - 2 shops here for weapons and junk. Will be changed soon.[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img594/2148/edgesx.png[/img]
[b][i]Fishing guild - Go fish[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img534/1194/fishb.png[/img]
[b][i]Grand Exchange - Works as a bank for now.[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img703/8023/41210285.png[/img]
[b][i]RFD Chest, buy your gloves here.[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img707/108/glovex.png[/img]
[b][i]Tor. Demons - Drops claws and armour pieces. [/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img856/2873/78591695.png[/img]
[b][i]Pest Control[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img338/7240/pestn.png[/img]
[b][i]Torva - Lifepoint bonus's work. Goes for all nex armour.[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img541/8879/torvahp.png[/img]
[b][i]Dag Kings[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img201/5636/dags.png[/img]
[b][i]Mithril Dragons[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img198/9694/miths.png[/img]
[b][i]Frosts[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img585/7922/frostp.png[/img]
[b][i]Fight Pits[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img194/3389/fightpit.png[/img]
[b][i]Duel[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img856/9262/dueln.png[/img]
[b][i]Corp[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img259/8831/corpi.png[/img]
[b][i]Godwars[/i][/b] [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img850/4941/clawsw.png[/img]
A starters guide: -If you wish to get some cash, you may thieve from stalls in Ardougne. -If you wish to buy items shops are located in Lumbridge to sell basic items. -Skilling locations are in the correct spots (mine any rock, cut any tree, fish in any spot, so on). -Once you reach a decent cb level you can start doing boss's which drop correct items, and items from a 'super rare drop table' which can be coins, seeds, herb supplies, and such. -To sell an item you can trade it to other players or use it on the G.E. counter.

item.title: Project Escape
item.dc:creator: @green_gp1 green__gp
item.description:
@green_gp1 wrote:

Fixed some stuff up, added a starter book for teleports to harder to access area’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Escape
item.dc:creator: @Farco Farco
item.description:
@Farco wrote:

You guys should join. This server will gain more and more players very soon once everything is in a good shape. We’re still fixing bugs, glitches and adding other stuff into the server though. The server is 20/7 so you’ll see the server go off for sometimes.

Esb/Farco.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Escape
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522
item.description:

way better than most PI’S!

Read full topic

item.title: Project Escape
item.dc:creator: @redrain995 redrain995
item.description:
@redrain995 wrote:

This is sooooo bad that it’s great! Really nice job, I might join up

Read full topic

item.title: Project Escape
item.dc:creator: @Farco Farco
item.description:
@Farco wrote:

Server’s looking a lot nicer and nicer. The owner’s in a progress of making new client that’ll include new stuff like : Nex, Dungeon, Hunter, Summoning and Construction. We know that we’re lacking community/market. But soon when we get enough players, there will be Clan wars, Soul Wars, and varies of other mini-games will be added. Just come check on the forum for the recent updates.

Thanks,

Esb

Read full topic

item.title: Project Escape
item.dc:creator: @green_gp1 green__gp
item.description:
@green_gp1 wrote:

Soulcist:

I don’t know if it’s me or something, but the first picture where the claws are using its special - it doesn’t look right. And this looks semi-appealing.

The stats on the account was 999, therefor killed it first claw hit. Normal users can’t be 999 str/att. Claws work fine for everyone no worries.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Escape
item.dc:creator: @green_gp1 green__gp
item.description:
@green_gp1 wrote:

Project Escape is needing new members We have a friendly staff, great eco system, tons of features, plenty to do, and updates daily/weekly.

Our forum has guides to help you get started, and you can ask any questions you may have.
Below the screenshots is a simple guide.

Forum link:
http://projectescape.x10.mx/forum/

Client link: (If you use any other client it maynot login properly).
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?lp9nj0mnc935wwe

Screenshots:
Runecarfting

Ard. Go here for stalls.

Bandit Camp - One of many training areas

Fully working Barrows.

Brim. Dungeon plenty of training here Works 100%

Chaos tunnels, fully working

Ard cloak tele - Teles to correct location. May be changed.

Lighthouse, go through the doors, down the ladders to train on daggs

Fully working dice, forced text overhead into chat.

Dragon pick works 100%, correct speed and animation.

Edgeville - 2 shops here for weapons and junk. Will be changed soon.

Fishing guild - Go fish

Grand Exchange - Works as a bank for now.

RFD Chest, buy your gloves here.

Tor. Demons - Drops claws and armour pieces.

Pest Control

Torva - Lifepoint bonus’s work. Goes for all nex armour.

Dag Kings

Mithril Dragons

Frosts

Fight Pits

Duel

Corp

Godwars

A starters guide:
-If you wish to get some cash, you may thieve from stalls in Ardougne.
-If you wish to buy items shops are located in Lumbridge to sell basic items.
-Skilling locations are in the correct spots (mine any rock, cut any tree, fish in any spot, so on).
-Once you reach a decent cb level you can start doing boss’s which drop correct items, and items from a ‘super rare drop table’ which can be coins, seeds, herb supplies, and such.
-To sell an item you can trade it to other players or use it on the G.E. counter.

Read full topic
